channel.title: Glory to \_^\_ the best in the world reee
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [The _^_ appreciation thread](https://forum.moparisthebest.com/t/the-----appreciation-thread/545003):
**LET US REVIVE THIS GLORY!!!!!!!!!! GLORY TO \_^\_**
I AM GOING TO APPRECIATE THE FUCK OUT OF THIS.

item.description:

[01:05:59] <%rel4y> [Drew] from others
[01:06:06] <~_^_> Drew: by not telling it to them ??
[01:06:11] <%rel4y> [Drew] oh

item.title: Glory to \_^\_ the best in the world reee
item.dc:creator: @Sapphirus Sapphirus
item.description:
@Sapphirus wrote:

03:10 <_^_> do you think there is such a thing as a country in the world that is superior to America ?
03:10 <@Sapphirus> Yes.
03:10 <@Sapphirus> nn
03:10 <_^_> WHAT
03:11 <_^_> what the FUCK
03:11 <_^_> America is the BEST
03:11 <_^_> we might have flaws or whatever but we are still fucking #1
03:11 <@Sapphirus> You can't stay the best with that attitude.
03:11 <_^_> well you already said you think there are better countries
03:11 <_^_> i think that is pure boulderdash
03:12 <_^_> absolute poppycock
03:12 <@Sapphirus> Like a fat grazing cow weaseling out of the fact it's a large sack of whale blubber.
03:12 <_^_> FUCK YOU
03:12 <_^_> i hope president trump nukes ontario
03:13 <@Sapphirus> Prestige, add him to a list.
03:13 <@Sapphirus> haha
03:13 <_^_> yeah add me to the list of
03:13 <_^_> red blooded real Americans
03:13 <@Prestige> lol
03:13 <@Prestige> Added to list of windows users
03:14 <_^_> Sapphirus all you are doing is spreading out bull shit into the universe
03:14 <_^_> you are not making Canada any more tremendous
03:14 <_^_> with your various activities
03:14 <_^_> but America is staggering forwards in leaps and fits
03:15 <_^_> we are screaming our way into the future
...
07:05 <_^_> ok i am headed to CHURCH

Read full topic
